text: Esino Lario is a comune (municipality) of the Province of Lecco in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is about north of Milan, northwest of Lecco, and about from the eastern shore of Lake Como. Esino Lario is next to these municipalities: Cortenova, Lierna, Mandello del Lario, Parlasco, Pasturo, Perledo, Primaluna, Taceno and Varenna. == References == Category:Settlements in Lecco
title: Esino Lario
